item.description:
Swing Dance w/ Eight to the Bar - Brightridge Club, E. Prov.
Posted by: Tom

Sat Nov 27 @ 8:00 PM
2nd Annual Turkey Day Dance Off with Eight to the Bar 8-11pm
Potluck (Bring us your leftovers!) Special Admission Price - $12 general

ETTB played here last year and the place was PACKED! Let's do it again! Work off that turkey & have a great time!

http://www.swingin88s...

If this is PACKED WE SHOULD GET THERE EARLY!! Band starts at 8 but might be wise to be there for 7pm get a table.
Hope we get a good outcome and everyone shows up!
If you indicate yes for attending please try and be there or change your rsvp to No.

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: SWING DANCE W/EIGHT TO THE BAR- BRIGHTRIDGE CLUB, E, PROVIDENCE
